name: Scoop (Act One)
description:
Nueva York, 1984. 

In the soaring shadows of the La Isla Verticals, beat reporter Alex Velasquez has one more story to file. Follow leads, collect quotes, and draft your article in this narrative detective game! 

Content warning: some swearing, one reference to suicide.

This is the opening act, written using Inkle. Thanks for playing - any comments or feedback are gratefully received :)
